column2: Proper names of people, including droids, first names, last names, individual or family names, unique nicknames.
Name of any place, such as a planet, city or geographical feature.
Names of companies, government agencies, educational institutions, military units
Derived/adjectival forms of GPE and Location names, as well as adjectival forms of named religions, heritage and political affiliation.
Any named armament, regardless of size - excludes generic terms like ‘weapon,’ ‘cannon,’ etc
Technobabble used to describe futuristic technology or the use thereof
Proper name of a specific instance of a vehicle capable of space travel
Official signifiers of ranks, titles, positions, most typically military ranks or other signifiers of status within an organization. Excludes informal/familial titles.
Other named entities, such as works of art or pet names
